resources.string:
Almost half of American adults are using digital voice assistants on their smartphones, in their cars and on other devices such as Amazon Echo and Google Home. The advances in recent years of technologies to support voice and conversational user interfaces are transporting our businesses and society into a new age of voice control.
Join us at WICT TIO 2018 and meet some of the experts who will demo products and talk about how voice and conversational user interfaces are designed, what technologies enable them, how they are being used, and why they are changing our lives.
Our event is open to the public, including men and women. Students under 18 must be supervised by an adult.
REGISTER TODAY! http://www.wictphiladelphia.org/event/tio2018
Join us for WICT Philadelphia Tech It Out event at:
Villanova University, 800 E Lancaster Avenue, Villanova, PA, 19085
